security.title: Security Setup
security.subtitle: Protect your account with additional security measures.
security.optionalDesc: These security features help protect your account and can be configured later from Settings.

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security with 2FA
twoFactor.info: 2FA will be configured after setup. You'll need an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.

recoveryEmail.title: Recovery Email
recoveryEmail.subtitle: Receive security alerts and account recovery options
recoveryEmail.error: Please enter a valid email address

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.subtitle: Generate backup codes for account recovery

tips.title: Security Best Practices
tips.tip1: Use a unique, strong password for your VeloZ account
tips.tip2: Enable IP restrictions on your exchange API keys
tips.tip3: Never share your API keys or recovery codes
tips.tip4: Regularly review your connected devices and sessions
